content: *this soft and snuggly baby blanket makes a great gift - crocheted in bernat baby blanket this pattern is great for beginners yarnspirations * **skill level ** beginner **materials ** bernat® baby blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m little lilac dove 04113 or peachy 04510 *2 balls or 360 yds/325 m* this is the square version the rectangular version is here rectangle version http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rock-a-bye-baby-blanket-2 a video tutorial for this blanket can be found at crochet crowd as the pat a cake blanket 1 =http //web archive org/web/20151029203552/http //www yarnspirations com/patterns/simple-baby-blanket-1 html 1 http //thecrochetcrowd com/pat-a-cake-baby-blanket/
